release.bugfix: Fixed freezes while opening the console
Fixed crashes after entering an invalid logs listening port
Fixed SA-MP servers info loading if the server address is specified as a URL
Fixed players list loading on Insurgency: Sandstorm servers
Fixed calculation of bots count on Insurgency: Sandstorm servers
Fixed the appearance of progress bars on Android 4.4
Fixed virtual keyboard overlapping on console input field on Android 4.4
Fixed double toolbar on Android 4.4-5.1
Fixed players list loading on some GoldSource servers
Fixed unavailability of some GoldSource servers if they have Reunion
Fixed detection of players access flags on GoldSource servers
Fixed getting corrupted data when executing large RCON requests on Sven Co-op servers
Fixed unnecessary auth attempts on Source and GoldSource servers if RCON password is not specified
Fixed wrong calculation of players/bots count on Source servers with Source TV
Fixed loading of extended players info on ZPS servers
Fixed unavailability of some GoldSource servers
Fixed items dragging on the RCON shortcuts editing dialog
release.info: Improved validation of user-entered server info

release.bugfix: Fixed home screen widget settings screen in landscape orientation
Fixed game type resetting when opening server edit screen
Fixed players counting on Insurgency servers
Fixed incorrect server port in servers list
Fixed local DB updating if the server name contains special chars

release.new: Support OGP, CW-SERV.RU and CSHost.com.ua API
release.info: Updated supported languages list[br](Thanks Tomislav Vasilev)

release.bugfix: Fixed crashes after incorrect App Bundle install
Fixed crashes after entering incorrect AppID
Fixed crashes after entering incorrect ban/mute time
Fixed RCON on goldsource if rcon_password contains special characters
Fixed players country loading
Fixed crashes after trying to edit removed server
Fixed rare crashes after trying to send an RCON command
Fixed loading untitled maps via Myarena API
Fixed wrong calculation of players count on CS:GO servers with bots
Partially fixed wrong calculation of players count on servers with GOTV
release.info: Updated supported languages list[br](Thanks Augus Salon)

release.bugfix: Fixed search players bans and stats
Fixed wrong calculation of bots count when using HLTV on goldsource
Fixed display of bots count if RevEmu hides them
Fixed incorrect swipes on some devices
Fixed rare crashes after checking network connection
Fixed rare crashes after trying to open camera
Fixed loading of available commands on goldsource servers
Fixed loading of players list if goldsource server using HLTV
Fixed loading avatars after scrolling players list
release.info: Updated supported languages list[br](Thanks Pjeter Jetishi)

release.bugfix: Rregullimi bllokimit gjatë hapjes së Open GP
Rregullimi në CP pas ndryshimeve
Rregullimi diktimit SB++ nëse përdor Material Admin
Rregullimi i cvar pas disa problemeve
release.info: Fshirja e disa kërkesave pas emërit të serverit
Improvizimi i listës së Cvar gjatë ngarkimit
Improvizimi i gabimit të lidhjes në internet

Rregullimi problemit të shfaqur gjatë instalimit App

Rregullimi i problemit gjatë përdorimit të stilit të vjetër tek GoldSource servers

Rregullimi i bllokimit tek disa paisje tek pjesa historisë
Rregullimi bllokimit pas përdorimit të ndalimit/largimit
Rregullimi pas rrotullimit të ndryshimeve
Rregullimi i paisjeve me kamerë mbrapa
Rregullimi pas tentimit të fshirjes së RCON Menus
Rregullimi i bllokimit pas rifreskimit të informatave

Rregullimi gabimeve gjatë Databazës
Rregullimi shfaqjes së gabuar të flamujve të qasjes
Rregullimi bllokimit kur variable variablave nuk mund të ngarkohet
Rregullimi duke shfaqur një gabim të gabuar pas ndryshimit të një ndryshoreje

release.new: Njoftim nëse serveri është i vjetëruar
release.info: Shumë gjëra të vogla janë rregulluar

Rregullimi app gjatë blerjeve
